isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Engine Electrical - Cleaning and Inspection

svcproc.title: Checking Wiring Harness and Electrical Connectors

step1.para: Check the connector pins on all electrical components. If any pins are bent, replace component.
Check each wiring harness for worn flexible conduit, and heat damage to wiring. Repair or replace each wiring harness as necessary.

Check each wiring harness connector for corrosion (green or gray and white deposits on the terminals), female connector sleeves that are spread open, and terminals that are pushed back relative to the other terminals in the same connector. Replace damaged connectors and terminals as necessary.
